title: Blackfoot (1890) Genesis and Portions
description: Blackfoot translation of the select passages from the Christian Scriptures by Rev. J. W. Tims in 1890 for the Society for Promoting Christian Knowledge. Blackfoot is a language spoken by the Blackfoot Tribe of North America.

language.name: Blackfoot
language.area: South Alberta, Blackfoot, Piegan, and Blood Reserves. Also in United States.
